SELECT toei_id, toei_equipment_name,toei_equipment_code,toei_equipment_core,toei_equipment_type,toei_equipment_country, toei_default_scheme,tose.tose_name as toei_default_schemename, toei_useing_scheme,tose2.tose_name as toei_useing_schemename,toei.isenable
FROM tvso_equipment_info toei LEFT JOIN tvso_scheme tose ON tose.tose_id = toei.toei_default_scheme LEFT JOIN tvso_scheme tose2 ON tose2.tose_id = toei.toei_useing_scheme WHERE 1=1 AND toei_equipment_name LIKE CONCAT(#{toeiEquipmentName},'%') AND toei_equipment_code LIKE CONCAT(#{toeiEquipmentCode},'%') ORDER BY toei_equipment_code DESC

SELECT toei_id, toei_equipment_name,toei_equipment_code,toei_equipment_core,toei_equipment_type,toei_equipment_country, toei_default_scheme,tose.tose_name as toei_default_schemename, toei_useing_scheme,tose2.tose_name as toei_useing_schemename,toei.isenable
FROM tvso_equipment_info toei LEFT JOIN tvso_scheme tose ON tose.tose_id = toei.toei_default_scheme LEFT JOIN tvso_scheme tose2 ON tose2.tose_id = toei.toei_useing_scheme WHERE toei_id = #{toeiId}
